name: Organisation For Underpriveleged Indian Population -Care

address: No.35, Sai Street, 9th Cross Extension, Krishna Nagar, Puducherry - 605008

briefDescription: To provide humanitarian service, social service, education and health care service and help build goodwill and peace in community. Relief to the poor and underprivileged Indian population. To provide general medical relief or aid or compensation or reimbursement of expenses by payment or establishing charitable dispensaries , clinics, hospitals, laboratories, blood banks, training for nurses and paramedics etc., to human beings. Aid or otherwise provide for relief for victims effected by flood, famine, fire and other natural calamities. To provide training and or maintenance of staff and any personal needed for education.
